original_text: And from the age of fifty years they shall withdraw from the duty of the service and serve no more.
korean_text: 오십 세부터는 그 일을 쉬어 봉사하지 아니할 것이나

sentences.original_text: And from the age of fifty years
they shall withdraw from the duty of the service

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 더 이상 섬기지 않을 것입니다
